name: Ricetta: Prelibatezze del Porto di pietra
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stone Harbor Delicacies.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Campaviola
value.desc:
Un fiorellino dalla grande vitalità. Si dice che la sua forma protesa verso il basso riesca a
conservarne il profumo più a lungo.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Prelibatezze del Porto di pietra
value.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
